### SCENE 18 / 19 – Hills & VUDA Park  

_Hero at the hills, voice-over:_

> VOICE (Hero): **Spoorty** recover avvadaniki peddha time patledhu, kani nenu teesukunna two-years time matram aagatledhu. Script raasukunna, inka aa **Aman** (“nenu camera handle chesta…”), ma **Golu** (“editing nenu chusukunta le Maya”) …

---

_In VUDA Park — Hero is late; Aman and Maya pick up the conversation._

**Ashesh:** Vadu ravadaniki late avutha anta…  
**Maya:** Hello…  
**Ashesh:** *Maya* kadha? Hi—nenu Aman.  
**Maya:** Hey, hi. Arjun nee gurinchi eppudu cheppaledhu… 😂  
_Maya trails off._

_Arjun jogs up._

**Maya:** Would you mind if I join?  
**Arjun:** *Of course*… nuvvu?  
**Ashesh:** You guys carry on.  
_Arjun (inner monologue): “Thanks ra.”  
Ashesh (inner monologue): “Aa matram ardam chesukolena…”_

_Maya and Arjun walk near a tree; he sits, offers his hand._

**Maya:** Oh… okay!  

---

**Ashesh:** Aipoindha?  
_Hero stands._  
**Ashesh (to Maya):** Disturb chesana?  
**Maya:** No, not at all.  
**Ashesh:** **Sai** vacchadu…  
**Arjun:** Sai aa?  
**Ashesh:** Ninna cheppa ga…  
_Arjun walks to Sai; they shake hands._

**Sai:** Ninna Aman naku script mail chesadu.  
**Arjun:** Ya, good. Andhulo 13th scene manam cheyyabotunnam. *Mee friend* ee camera anukondi…  
**Sai:** Good, okay—ready. _(checks mobile)_ Konchem aggressive scene la undhi.  
**Arjun:** Ha—meeru konchem **kopam** ga untaru. Ready?  
**Sai:** All good, ok.  
**Ashesh (clapper):** **Action!**  
**Sai:** *Rolling*! Camera emi undadha?  
**Ashesh:** Camera roll avtundhi; meeru act cheyyandi.  
**Sai:** Chudu—_bangs head_—idhi correct kadhu!  
**Arjun:** **Cut**! Antha aggression enduku andi? Konchem *real*, natural ga. **Take again**—action.  
**Sai:** *Chudu, idhi correct kadhu…* _(reads with no gap)_  
**Arjun:** **Cut**…  
**Ashesh:** Bro, mari **numb** ga vachchindi expression—come on, inka better.  
**Sai:** Chudu… _(blows air)_  
**Arjun:** Chustunna… poga oduluthav entra…  
_Arjun throws his papers, letting them drift down._

_He walks away; Maya and Ashesh follow._

**Maya:** Arjun, come on… *Nee mood* batte set-lo unna vallalaki mood depend ayyi untadi. Voice-thone problem kadha; dubbing appudu chuddam.  
**Golu:** Avunu ra—editing appudu yedaina magic cheyyochu.  
_Arjun walks back._

**Arjun (quiet):** Clip okay… _(inaudible)_  

_Camera slowly pans away._

<!-- lang: en+te | end Scene 19 -->
